summary: A memorandum from the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York dated August 12, 2019, documenting information passed from the Special Housing Unit on August 9, 2019, regarding inmate Jeffrey Epstein needing a cellmate upon return from an attorney visit, and inmate Reyes possibly not returning. This document was created two days before Epstein's death.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Identified as inmate #76318-054 at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, noted as needing a cellmate upon return from an attorney visit.

persons.name: Reyes
persons.context: Identified as inmate #85993-054 at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, with information passed that he was 'going WAB and possibly may not return'.

events.title: Information Passed from Special Housing Unit
events.description: At approximately 1:50 PM, information was passed from the Special Housing Unit to oncoming staff regarding inmates Reyes and Epstein. It was noted that inmate Reyes was 'going WAB and possibly may not return' and that inmate Epstein would need a cellmate upon his return from an attorney visit.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, New York
keyFacts: The memorandum is dated August 12, 2019, two days before Jeffrey Epstein's death on August 10, 2019.
It documents information passed on August 9, 2019, regarding inmate Epstein needing a cellmate upon his return from an attorney visit.
It also notes that inmate Reyes was 'going WAB and possibly may not return'.
The document originates from the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York where Epstein was being held.
